title: 1.5版本自动退出
author: jklgp
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking entity
A full error report has been saved to E:\game\新建文件夹\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-29_22.00.17-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
这样的，玩着很流畅。

replies.author: alecone
replies.txt_content:
用纯净版玩,先不要急着用懒人包,找什么mod.
纯净版可以看mcbbs首页右侧版本号.

replies.author: eruw111
replies.txt_content: 有可能是mod的安装方法不对，试试重新组装一次，要按照方法一步步安装
